basic.description:
{Basic Luck}

Increases {luck & defence by 1} and casts { Fortune } at battle opening for {10} rounds

advanced.description:
{Advanced Luck}

Increases {luck & defence by 2} and casts { Fortune } at battle opening for {25} rounds

expert.description:
{Expert Luck}

Increases {luck & defence by 3} and casts { Fortune } at battle opening for {50} rounds
